definition[0]: if you stiffen, your body suddenly becomes firm, straight, or still because you feel angry or anxious
example[0]: He touched her, and she stiffened.
definition[1]: to become stronger, more severe, or more determined, or to make something do this
example[1]: a campaign to stiffen rules against drink-driving
example[2]: Their opposition only stiffened my resolve.
definition[2]: to become painful and difficult to move
definition[3]: to make material stiff so that it will not bend easily
